statements: SELECT * FROM team_performance_reports WHERE team_name = 'Team Alpha';
SELECT report_id, team_name, performance_metric FROM team_performance_reports WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT project_outcome, productivity_metric FROM team_performance_reports WHERE productivity_metric < 0.5 ORDER BY productivity_metric DESC;
SELECT team_name, performance_metric, project_outcome FROM team_performance_reports WHERE team_name LIKE '%Team%';
SELECT * FROM team_performance_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_reports WHERE team_name = 'Engineering' ORDER BY performance_metric DESC, project_outcome ASC;
SELECT team_name, AVG(performance_metric) AS avg_performance FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_name HAVING AVG(performance_metric) > 80;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports, SUM(productivity_metric) AS total_productivity FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, project_outcome FROM team_performance_reports WHERE performance_metric > 90 AND productivity_metric > 0.9 ORDER BY team_name ASC;

SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports, AVG(performance_metric) AS avg_performance_metric FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC, avg_performance_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_performance;
SELECT team_name, productivity_metric FROM team_performance WHERE productivity_metric > 0.7;
SELECT team_name, project_outcome FROM team_performance ORDER BY project_outcome DESC;
SELECT AVG(productivity_metric) AS average_productivity FROM team_performance;
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM team_performance WHERE team_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT team_name, productivity_metric, project_outcome FROM team_performance WHERE productivity_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT user_name, efficiency_score FROM remote_work_efficiency WHERE work_hours >= 40 ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT team_name, project_outcome FROM team_performance WHERE project_outcome LIKE '%successful%'
SELECT team_name, AVG(productivity_metric) AS avg_productivity FROM team_performance GROUP BY team_name HAVING avg_productivity > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_productivity DESC
SELECT team_name, SUM(productivity_metric) AS total_productivity FROM team_performance GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_productivity > 2 ORDER BY total_productivity DESC
SELECT * FROM team_performance;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, total_members FROM team_performance ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM team_performance WHERE total_members > 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_manager FROM project_outcomes WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM productivity_metrics ORDER BY metric_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_performance ORDER BY team_name DESC, total_members ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, total_members FROM team_performance WHERE total_members > 5;
SELECT project_name, outcome_description FROM project_outcomes WHERE project_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM productivity_metrics WHERE metric_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_performance JOIN productivity_metrics ON team_performance.team_id = productivity_metrics.metric_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM team_members WHERE team_name = 'Development';
SELECT * FROM productivity_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM project_outcomes WHERE success = true;
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM team_reports;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE team_name = 'Engineering' ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_id, team_name FROM team_members WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01' AND join_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT member_name, join_date FROM team_members JOIN team_reports ON team_members.team_name = team_reports.team_name WHERE team_reports.report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT project_name, completion_date, success FROM project_outcomes WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM productivity_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 80;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, productivity_metric FROM team_performance_reports WHERE efficiency_rating > 80;
SELECT team_id, AVG(productivity_metric) AS avg_productivity FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_outcomes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, productivity_score AS productivity_rating FROM employee_productivity WHERE performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, productivity_metric ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_id, AVG(productivity_metric) AS avg_productivity, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_efficiency FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_id HAVING AVG(productivity_metric) > 50;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, outcome_description FROM project_outcomes WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT employee_name, department, productivity_score, performance_rating FROM employee_productivity WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, team_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM work_efficiency_metrics GROUP BY team_id, metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC LIMIT 5;
